trans-unit.source: A client receiver for multicast traffic from a single source, also known as Source Specific Multicast (SSM).
trans-unit.target: En klient-mottakeren for multikastingstrafikk fra én kilde, også kjent som kilde bestemte multikastingsbyte (SSM).

trans-unit.source: The multicast group address and sender source address must be known.
trans-unit.target: Multikastingsbyte Gruppeadresse og avsenderen kildeadresse må være kjent.

trans-unit.source: In addition to receiving multicast data from a specific sender, the UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient client can also send unicast data back to the sender.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til mottak av multikastingsbyte data fra en bestemt avsender, kan UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient klienten også sende unicast data tilbake til avsenderen.

trans-unit.source: To receive multicast from multiple sources, or when the sources aren't known in advance, use the UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient class instead.
trans-unit.target: Motta multikast fra flere kilder, eller når kildene ikke er kjent på forhånd, klassen UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient for bruk i stedet.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> UDP client that can subscribe to a group address and receive datagrams from a single source.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"> </xref> UDP-klienten kan abonnere på en Gruppeadresse og mottar datagram fra én kilde.

trans-unit.source: The UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient constructor associates a UDP multicast socket with a group address and port, but does not bind or otherwise use the socket.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient knytter en multikastings socket UDP en Gruppeadresse og -port, har men ikke binde eller bruke ellers socket.

trans-unit.source: The `groupAddress` parameter may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Den `groupAddress` parameteren kan være en IPv6- eller IPv4 multikastings adresse.

trans-unit.source: However, the address family of the `sourceAddress` and `groupAddress` parameters must the same.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid familien adresse for den `sourceAddress` og `groupAddress` parametere må den samme.

trans-unit.source: The `localPort` parameter must not specify a port less than 1,024.
trans-unit.target: Den `localPort` parameteren må ikke angi en port som er mindre enn 1 024.

trans-unit.source: The sender source address for this receiver to subscribe to.
trans-unit.target: Avsenderen kilde-adresse for denne mottakeren til å abonnere på.

trans-unit.source: The multicast group address for this receiver to subscribe to.
trans-unit.target: Adressen til multikastingsbyte gruppen for denne mottakeren til å abonnere på.

trans-unit.source: The local port for this receiver to bind to.
trans-unit.target: Den lokale porten for dette mottakeren skal bindes til.

trans-unit.source: sourceAddress and groupAddress must be the same address family.
trans-unit.target: sourceAddressog groupAddress må være i samme familie for postadressen.

trans-unit.source: sourceAddress is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: sourceAddresser en nullreferanse (ingenting i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: -or- groupAddress is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: - eller - groupAddress er en nullreferanse (ingenting i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: localPort is less than 0 -or- localPort is greater than 65,535.
trans-unit.target: localPorter mindre enn 0 - eller - localPort er større enn 65 535.

trans-unit.source: localPort is less than 1024
trans-unit.target: localPorter mindre enn 1024

trans-unit.source: Binds the socket and begins a join operation to the multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from a single source address.
trans-unit.target: Binding socket og starter en join-operasjon i gruppen multikastingsbyte å tillate datagram mottas fra en enkelt kildeadresse.

trans-unit.source: The BeginJoinGroup method binds a UDP multicast socket to a local port and joins a multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from a single source address.
trans-unit.target: Metoden BeginJoinGroup binding en multikastings socket UDP til en lokal port, og slår en multikastings gruppe for å tillate datagram mottas fra en enkelt kildeadresse.

trans-unit.source: The multicast group address, single source address, and local port to bind to are specified in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Den multikastingsbyte Gruppeadresse én datakilde og adresse lokal port skal bindes til er angitt i den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when the operation to join the multicast group has completed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden som er angitt i den `callback` parameteren aktiveres ved å koble til multikastingsbyte gruppe-operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: If required by the runtime, the BeginJoinGroup method also performs a policy check to verify that the client is allowed to access the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det kreves av kjøretiden, utfører metoden BeginJoinGroup også policykontroll for å bekrefte at klienten kan få tilgang til gruppen multikastingsbyte.

trans-unit.source: If the client is not allowed access, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown with <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis klienten ikke er gitt tilgang, en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>et med <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: A callback method to invoke when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: En tilbakeringing metode for å aktivere når operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: Optional state information to pass to the `callback` method for this operation.
trans-unit.target: Valgfri statusinformasjon skal sendes til den `callback` metoden for denne operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.IAsyncResult>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref:System.IAsyncResult>.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references this operation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som refererer til denne operasjonen.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has already been joined or a join operation is currently in progress.
trans-unit.target: Multikastingsbyte gruppen allerede er koblet eller en join-operasjon pågår.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under forsøk på å få tilgang til socket.

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se kommentarer for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Begins the operation of receiving a packet from the joined multicast group and invokes the specified callback when a packet has arrived on the group from a specified sender.
trans-unit.target: Starter operasjonen til å motta en pakke fra den koblede multikastingsbyte gruppen og aktiverer den angitte tilbakeringingen når en pakke er mottatt for gruppen fra en angitt avsender.

trans-unit.source: The BeginReceiveFromSource method begins an operation of receiving a UDP packet from the joined multicast group from a single sender.
trans-unit.target: Metoden BeginReceiveFromSource starter en operasjon for å motta en UDP-pakke fra den koblede multikastingsbyte gruppen fra en avsender.

trans-unit.source: The local port, multicast group, and sender source address are specified in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Lokal port, multikastingsbyte grupper og avsenderen kildeadresse er angitt i den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The multicast client must also have completed a join to the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: Multikastingsbyte klienten må også har fylt ut en kobling til multikastingsbyte gruppen.

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has received.
trans-unit.target: Metoden som er angitt i den `callback` parameteren aktiveres når du har mottatt en pakke.

trans-unit.source: It is possible to have a socket failure if a receive operation fails synchronously, although this is uncommon with UDP.
trans-unit.target: Det er mulig å ha en socket-feil hvis et receive-operasjonen mislykkes synkront, selv om dette er uvanlig med UDP.

trans-unit.source: If a socket failure occurs, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det oppstår en socket-feil, en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>forårsakes.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: The error received is specified as a member of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Feilen er angitt som et medlem av den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>opplisting.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>

trans-unit.source: The buffer to store the received data.
trans-unit.target: Buffer til å lagre den mottatte data.

trans-unit.source: The offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the `buffer` where the data should be stored.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvningen for, i byte fra begynnelsen av den `buffer` hvor dataene skal lagres.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to receive and store in the `buffer`.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall byte som skal motta og lagre i den `buffer`.

trans-unit.source: The callback method to invoke when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Metoden tilbakeringing for å aktivere når operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: Optional state information to pass to the `callback` method for this operation.
trans-unit.target: Valgfri statusinformasjon skal sendes til den `callback` metoden for denne operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.IAsyncResult>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref:System.IAsyncResult>.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references this operation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som refererer til denne operasjonen.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: buffer is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: bufferer en nullreferanse (ingenting i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: offset is less than 0 -or- offset is greater than the length of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: offseter mindre enn 0 - eller - offset er større enn lengden på den buffer.

trans-unit.source: -or- count is less than 0 -or- offset plus the count is greater than the length of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: - eller - count er mindre enn 0 - eller - offset pluss antallet er større enn lengden på den buffer.

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: Gruppen multikastingsbyte er ennå ikke koblet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket for receiving.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under forsøk på å få tilgang til socket for mottak.

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se kommentarer for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Begins the operation of sending a unicast packet to the source previously specified.
trans-unit.target: Starter operasjonen til å sende en unicast pakke til den tidligere angitte kilden.

trans-unit.source: The BeginSendToSource method begins an operation of sending a UDP packet to the source previously specified.
trans-unit.target: Metoden BeginSendToSource starter en operasjon for å sende en UDP-pakke til den tidligere angitte kilden.

trans-unit.source: Some protocols use this information to pass along flow control, quality of service statistics, or recovery messages.
trans-unit.target: Enkelte protokoller bruke denne informasjonen til å overføre langs flytkontroll, kvaliteten på tjenesten statistikk eller gjenoppretting av meldinger.

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has been sent.
trans-unit.target: Metoden som er angitt i den `callback` parameteren aktiveres når en pakke er sendt.

trans-unit.source: The client must have completed a join to the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: Klienten må være fullført en kobling til multikastingsbyte gruppen.

trans-unit.source: If the destination port specified in the `remotePort` parameter is less than 1,024, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown with <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis målporten som er angitt i den `remotePort` parameteren er mindre enn 1 024, en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>et med <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: It is possible to have a socket failure if a send operation fails synchronously, although this is uncommon with UDP.
trans-unit.target: Det er mulig å ha en socket-feil hvis en sendingsoperasjonen mislykkes synkront, selv om dette er uvanlig med UDP.

trans-unit.source: If a socket failure occurs, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det oppstår en socket-feil, en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>forårsakes.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: The error received is specified as a member of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Feilen er angitt som et medlem av den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>opplisting.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>

trans-unit.source: The buffer that contains the data to send.
trans-unit.target: Bufferen som inneholder dataene som skal sendes.

trans-unit.source: The offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the `buffer` to read the data to be sent.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvningen for, i byte fra begynnelsen av den `buffer` kan lese data sendes.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to send from the `buffer`.
trans-unit.target: Antall byte som skal sendes fra den `buffer`.

trans-unit.source: The remote port to which the packet is to be sent.
trans-unit.target: Den eksterne porten som pakken sendes.

trans-unit.source: The remote address is specified by the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Ekstern adresse er angitt i den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A> konstruktør.

trans-unit.source: The callback method to invoke when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Metoden tilbakeringing for å aktivere når operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: Optional state information to pass to the `callback` method for this operation.
trans-unit.target: Valgfri statusinformasjon skal sendes til den `callback` metoden for denne operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.IAsyncResult>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref:System.IAsyncResult>.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references this operation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som refererer til denne operasjonen.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: buffer is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: bufferer en nullreferanse (ingenting i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: offset is less than 0 -or- offset is greater than the length of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: offseter mindre enn 0 - eller - offset er større enn lengden på den buffer.

trans-unit.source: -or- count is less than 0 -or- offset plus the count is greater than the length of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: - eller - count er mindre enn 0 - eller - offset pluss antallet er større enn lengden på den buffer.

trans-unit.source: -or- remotePort is less than 0 or greater than 65,535.
trans-unit.target: - eller - remotePort er mindre enn 0 eller større enn 65 535.

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: Gruppen multikastingsbyte er ennå ikke koblet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under forsøk på å få tilgang til socket.

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se kommentarer for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Leaves the multicast group and releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> class and the underlying the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Forlater gruppen multikastingsbyte og frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"> </xref> klassen og den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>.
trans-unit.target: Kall avhending når du er ferdig med <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Fjerningsmetoden forlater den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter å avhending, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>Slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>ble tar opp.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>

trans-unit.source: Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>.
trans-unit.target: Ring alltid avhending før du slipper siste referanse til <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient> object's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressurser den bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamling kall av <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>objektets <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>

trans-unit.source: Completes the asynchronous join group operation to a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: Fullfører asynkrone gruppen tilkoblingsoperasjonen til en multikastings gruppe.

trans-unit.source: The EndJoinGroup method completes an asynchronous bind to a socket and join operation to a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: Metoden EndJoinGroup fullfører en asynkron binde til en operasjon socket og koble til en multikastings gruppe.

trans-unit.source: If required by the runtime, the EndJoinGroup method also performs a policy check to verify that the client is allowed to access the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det kreves av kjøretiden, utfører metoden EndJoinGroup også policykontroll for å bekrefte at klienten kan få tilgang til gruppen multikastingsbyte.

trans-unit.source: If the client is not allowed access, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown with <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis klienten ikke er gitt tilgang, en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>et med <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: If there is a socket failure while performing the join group operation, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er en socket-feil under utføring av tilkoblingsoperasjonen gruppen en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>forårsakes.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: The error received is specified as a member of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Feilen er angitt som et medlem av den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>opplisting.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>

trans-unit.source: The result of the asynchronous join operation.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet av asynkron join-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: result is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: resulter en nullreferanse (ingenting i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under forsøk på å få tilgang til socket.

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se kommentarer for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Completes the asynchronous operation of receiving a packet from the joined multicast group and provides the information received.
trans-unit.target: Fullfører den asynkrone operasjonen av mottak av en pakke fra den koblede multikastingsbyte gruppen, og gir informasjon som er mottatt.

trans-unit.source: The EndReceiveFromSource method completes an asynchronous operation to receive a packet from a single source in a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: Metoden EndReceiveFromSource fullfører en asynkron operasjon for å motta en pakke fra én kilde i en multikastings-gruppen.

trans-unit.source: If there is a socket failure while performing the receive operation, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er en socket-feil under utføring av receive-operasjonen en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>forårsakes.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: The error received is specified as a member of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Feilen er angitt som et medlem av den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>opplisting.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>

trans-unit.source: The result of the asynchronous receive operation.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet av den asynkrone motta operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The source endpoint where the packet was received from.
trans-unit.target: Kilde-endepunktet der pakken ble mottatt fra.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The length, in bytes, of the message stored in the buffer parameter passed to the method.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på meldingen som er lagret i, i byte i buffer -parameteren sendt til den metoden.

trans-unit.source: result is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: resulter en nullreferanse (ingenting i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: Gruppen multikastingsbyte er ennå ikke koblet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under forsøk på å få tilgang til socket.

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se kommentarer for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Completes the operation of sending a unicast packet to a single source.
trans-unit.target: Fullfører operasjonen til å sende en unicast pakke til en enkelt datakilde.

trans-unit.source: The EndSendToSource method completes an asynchronous operation to send a packet to single source previously specified.
trans-unit.target: Metoden EndSendToSource fullfører en asynkron operasjon for å sende en pakke til én datakilde angitt tidligere.

trans-unit.source: If there is a socket failure while performing the receive operation, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er en socket-feil under utføring av receive-operasjonen en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>forårsakes.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: The error received is specified as a member of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Feilen er angitt som et medlem av den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>opplisting.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>

trans-unit.source: The result of the asynchronous send operation.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet av asynkron sendeoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: result is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: resulter en nullreferanse (ingenting i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: Gruppen multikastingsbyte er ennå ikke koblet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under forsøk på å få tilgang til socket.

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se kommentarer for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> used for multicast receive operations on this <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir størrelsen, i byte for mottaksbufferen av den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>brukes til multikastingsbyte receive-operasjoner i denne <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"> </xref> forekomsten.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: The `ReceiveBufferSize` property gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> used for multicast receive operations on this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient> instance.
trans-unit.target: Den `ReceiveBufferSize` egenskapen henter eller angir størrelsen, i byte for mottaksbufferen for den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>brukes til multikastingsbyte receive-operasjoner i denne <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>forekomsten.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the `ReceiveBufferSize` property controls the size of the buffer used by the stack when a packet arrives, but the application has not yet called the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nærmere bestemt i `ReceiveBufferSize` egenskapen kontrollerer størrelsen på bufferen som brukes av stakken når en pakke ankommer, men programmet er ennå ikke kalt den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this buffer gets filled up and packets keep coming before the application calls the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.EndReceiveFromSource%2A> methods, old packets will get dropped.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne bufferen henter fylt og pakker kommer før programmet kall av <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A>og <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.EndReceiveFromSource%2A>metoder, gamle pakker vil få slettet.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.EndReceiveFromSource%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application will never be able to receive the old packets, and will instead receive newer packets when it calls the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Programmet vil ikke kunne motta gamle-pakker og mottar i stedet nyere pakker når det kaller den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default size of the receive buffer on Windows is 8,192.
trans-unit.target: Standardstørrelsen på mottaksbufferen på Windows er 8192.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The size, in bytes, of the receive buffer.
trans-unit.target: Størrelse i byte for mottaksbufferen.

trans-unit.source: The buffer size specified is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte bufferstørrelsen er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: Gruppen multikastingsbyte er ennå ikke koblet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the send buffer of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> used for multicast send operations on this <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir størrelsen, i byte for sendebuffer med den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>brukes til multikastingsbyte send operasjoner i denne <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"> </xref> forekomsten.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: The SendBufferSize property gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the send buffer of the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> used for multicast send operations on this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient> instance.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SendBufferSize henter eller angir størrelsen, i byte for sendebufferen for den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>brukes til multikastingsbyte send operasjoner i denne <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>forekomsten.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: On Mac OS X, the SendBufferSize property controls how many bytes can be in the network stack's waiting-to-be-sent buffer before additional calls to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginSendToSource%2A> method start failing.
trans-unit.target: På Mac OS X, styrer egenskapen SendBufferSize hvor mange byte kan være i nettverksstakken venting---sendes bufferen før flere kall til den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginSendToSource%2A>metoden starte mislykkes.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginSendToSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applications on Mac OS X may need to be concerned with this property if they are sending a large number of UDP packets in a short timeframe.
trans-unit.target: Programmer på Mac OS X må være bekymret med denne egenskapen hvis de sender et stort antall UDP-pakker i et kort tidsrom.

trans-unit.source: On Windows, calls to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginSendToSource%2A> method will take longer to call the callback depending on the value of the SendBufferSize property if the send buffer is full.
trans-unit.target: På Windows, kaller du opp den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginSendToSource%2A>metoden tar lengre tid å ringe tilbakeringing avhengig av verdien for egenskapen SendBufferSize sendebufferen er full.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginSendToSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SendBufferSize property only controls whether the user's buffer stays locked in physical memory until the send completes.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SendBufferSize bare kontrollerer om brukerens bufferen forblir låst i minnet før send er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The default size of the send buffer on Windows is 8,192.
trans-unit.target: Standardstørrelsen på sendebufferen på Windows er 8192.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The size, in bytes, of the send buffer.
trans-unit.target: Størrelse i byte for sendebufferen.

trans-unit.source: The buffer size specified is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte bufferstørrelsen er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: Gruppen multikastingsbyte er ennå ikke koblet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.
